articles.title: Lisandro Martinez: Argentina international has shone for Ajax and offers brains, brawn and versatility
articles.description: Man Utd have agreed a deal for Ajaxs Lisandro Martinez; Argentina international, who can play at centre-back, left-back and in central midfield was also wanted by Arsenal, and has excelled since his arrival in Holland in 2019
articles.content:
"At the beginning, I felt like going home and crying," said Lisandro Martinez. It was August 2020 and, in an interview with La Nacion, the young Argentine was recalling his arrival at Ajax a year earlier.

articles.title: Scotland caused own downfall in Argentina defeat
articles.description: Scotland were "architects of our own downfall" in the dramatic 34-31 defeat that gave Argentina a Test series victory, says captain Hamish Watson.

articles.title: Manchester United reach agreement with Ajax over transfer of Lisandro Martinez
articles.description: The Argentina international has been with the Dutch champions since 2019.
articles.content:
Manchester United have moved a step closer to a third signing of the summer after an agreement was reached with Ajax over the transfer of Lisandro Martinez.

articles.title: Rugby-Last-gasp try hands Argentina series win over Scotland
articles.description: Argentina’s other tries were scored by Santiago Carreras, Nahuel Tetaz Chapparo and substitute scrumhalf Gonzalo Bertranou, whose opportunistic effort 13 minutes from time turned the test in the Los Pumas’ favour. Ewan Ashman and Duhan van der Merwe scored two tries each for Scotland with Blair Kinghorn adding four conversions and a penalty.
articles.content:
A rgentina's Emiliano Boffelli scored a last-gasp try as they snatched a dramatic 34-31 win over Scotland in the third test on Saturday after coming from 15 points down to win the series.
